DescriptionData.Title: Facing the Sea - Snazaroo/Smiley
DescriptionData.Description: A fun 56 page book featuring artist Lisa Smiley's sea faces. Each design has step-by-step text by Gary Cole of Snazaroo and photos with loads of extra tips for the face painter. Chapters: Setup, Pink Leopard Shark, Penguin, Angler Fish, Octopus, Grey Whale, Red Jellyfish, Steel Head, Playing Dolphins, Iguanas, Brittle Star, Crab, Blue Fish, Shell Princess, Colorful Squid, Fish Bones, Cuttle Fish, Pelican, Lobster, Seahorse, Tiger Shark, Shark Attack, Hammerhead, Rainbow Shark, Sea Lion, Closing. Pamphlet size, 56-page, photo paperback.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Designs included; Pink Leopard Shark, Penguin, Angler Fish, Octopus, Grey Whale, Red Jellyfish, Steel Head, Playing Dolphins, Iguanas, Brittle Star, Crab, Blue Fish, Shell Princess, Colorful Squid, Fish Bones, Cuttle Fish, Pelican, Lobster, Seahorse, Tiger Shark, Shark Attack, Hammerhead, Rainbow Shark, Sea Lion,
Step by step instructions with full color photographs
Easy to follow sea and beach designs
